sentence.Network_en: Psychology began as a purely academic offshoot of natural philosophy.

entry.def: If one thing is an offshoot of another, it has developed from that other thing.

example.ex: Psychology began as a purely academic offshoot of natural philosophy...
example.tran: 心理学最初是自然哲学一个纯粹的学术分支。
